lyrics:
See I know a little bit something good
Always comes out of a little bit something bad
And I wasn't looking for someone new
Till you came down
Giving me the best that I've had

And now you're on my skin
Body to body
Working me out
Yeah you, you play to win
Rocking me steady
Round after round

I wish you were my first love
'Cause if you were first
Baby there would've been no second
Third or fourth love

I wish you were my first love
'Cause if you were first
Baby there would've been no second
Third or fourth love

It ain't no thing

So good, knowin' I can just keep it real
T-shirt and jeans
Still you're making me feel so fly

And now you're on my skin
Body to body
Working me out
Yeah you, you play to win
Rocking me steady
Round after round

I wish you were my first love
'Cause if you were first
Baby there would've been no second
Third or fourth love

'Cause if you were first
Baby there would've been no second
